title: Reddit
cleaned_text: [r/Shamanism](/r/Shamanism/) A place to ask and share, explore and learn at the fringes where spirit and material meet. The past few days I've had overwhelming anxiety. My stomach has been in knots and feels like there's this pit. I get waves of nausea and feel like I may be sick. I barely have an appetite but I know I need to eat still. I haven't been sleeping well as a result. I feel like maybe I'm in an emotional and physical detox. I've always had anxiety and have been managing it well. I haven't felt this level of physical discomfort in years. I did microdose mushrooms on Monday and took a Wim Hoff method bath. Could those have brought this on? Does anyone else have
